docs.snippet: By executing a senior Shiite cleric, Saudi Arabia effectively lit a match to set off regional sectarian tensions and its rivalry with Iran, threatening to derail already-shaky peace efforts over the wars in Syria and Yemen....
docs.lead_paragraph: By executing a senior Shiite cleric, Saudi Arabia effectively lit a match to set off regional sectarian tensions and its rivalry with Iran, threatening to derail already-shaky peace efforts over the wars in Syria and Yemen.

headline.main: AP Analysis: With Execution, Saudis Ignite Regional Tensions
headline.print_headline: AP Analysis: With Execution, Saudis Ignite Regional Tensions
